channel.title: time on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in time on Barefoot Rob

item.title: time zoned
item.description: 01:22 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT I vaped for the first time. 01:28 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT I think it has been 20 minutes. Let’s see: 01:51 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT yay! 02:00 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT I sometimes think I feel it more if I talk. 02:14 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT Life is Improv 02:22 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT ate a brownie 02:43 Monday 18 March 2019 PDT My dad said I am a responsible person.

item.title: 4 hours to Haneda
item.description: 19:06 Monday 01 January 2018 JST Had a little nap for 3 hours or so Distracted now watching Logan Lucky while writing and trying to remember whsat I was going to write. While sleeping I guess I felt the plane dip a bit and it appeared in my dream We descended and hovered down by the water down by the cruise ship. I didn't recognize any of my old friends there, but was optimistic there were some onboard.

item.title: time
item.description: 04:54 Sunday 31 December 2017 -02 Ten point five hours to go in our flight. It’s 5am Sao Paulo time, and 4pm Tokyo time. I took a 3.5 hour nap in Sao Paulo and woke up around 8:45pm (and wrote a journal entry about a dream I had writing a journal entry about a dream I had) and have thereby been awake 8 hours. I plan to be awake 6 more hours, at which point I will have 4 more hours of flight time to sleep before we arrive in Dubai.

item.title: chillin at the airport in Sao Paulo
item.description: 23:16 Saturday 30 December 2017 -02 I think we thought the flight leaves at 00:15, in which case we would begin boarding in 20 minutes or so. But it’s at 01:15 so we have 80 minutes or so. Lin is shopping for souvenirs though our bags are overweight, and will apparently cost $100 in Dubai because *they are very strict there”

item.title: glass museum
item.description: 12:46 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST Allow more time when going to the glass museum in Azumino. Or maybe just go early. We went around 10:45 and there was a queue for blowing glass until 1pm. I did get to talk to a couple of guys down in the glass blowing room. Was soooo happy that they did not turn me away for being barefoot. I could easily imagine a rule, but apparently there was not.

item.title: walking slowly to station
item.description: 07:51 Thursday 27 October 2016 JST My slow walk to station time takes 25 minutes Sub times: 3:00 from house to first light 4:00 from light to top of valley 5:00 from top of valley to next light 4:00 from light after valley 3:30 valley light to vending and pokestop 2:00 from last traffic light to last light 3:30 from last light to platform Given these intervals, if I’m late leaving for the station, I only need to catch up to one of these points and I know I can walk slowly again.
